author: beforeitsnews.com
title: You Just Can’t Make This Stuff Up | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
No matter how weird you think you are…
Jessica Jin
A woman named Jessica Jin at university in Texas is incensed that the new law in that state allows students who are licensed to bring a gun to school. Because it’s so unfairrr. The universities will not allow students to bring their dildos to school.
Really.
She has a Facebook page in order to protest the horror. It’s titled, “Campus (DILDO) Carry” .
The State of Texas has decided that it is not at all obnoxious to allow deadly concealed weapons in classrooms, however it DOES have strict rules about free sexual expression, to protect your innocence. You would receive a citation for taking a DILDO to class before you would get in trouble for taking a gun to class. Heaven forbid the penis.”
From the comments section on her page:
